headline: Canva Begins Share Sale at $42 Billion Valuation in Road to IPO
summary: Employees can sell stock to new and existing investors, including Fidelity Management & Research Co. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s asset management arm, Canva said in a statement on Wednesday.  The offer boosts Canva’s valuation more than 30% — it was valued at $32 billion in 2024.  Canva is adding artificial intelligence enhancements to its design tools in a push to juice revenue growth and gear up for a potential initial public offering.
